mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tokens WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND expired = false AND revoked = false
mapper.update: UPDATE tokens SET expired = true, revoked = true WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND expired = false AND revoked = false
UPDATE tokens SET expired = true, revoked = true WHERE token = #{token} AND expired = false AND revoked = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tokens (account_id, token, token_type, expired, revoked) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{token}, #{tokenType}, #{expired}, #{revoked})
